The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 January is 3,322,195 (5,902.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 January, there were 185,760 new confirmed cases (330.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 January, there were 255,884 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (70,124 fewer cases).
